abs.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • abs.controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The user controller handles the login/registration and logout functions.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    OwnerController, CustomerController

                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws CredentialsInvalidException
        Login a user.
        Parameters:
        email - the email
        password - the password
        Throws:

      • register

        public static void register(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String phone,
                            java.lang.Boolean isOwner)
                     throws RegistrationValidationException,
                            RegistrationNonUniqueException
        Register a new customer or owner
        Parameters:
        name - the users name
        email - the users email
        password - the users password
        address - the users address
        phone - the users phone
        isOwner - is the user is an owner
        Throws:
        RegistrationValidationException - if the registration details are invalid or null
        RegistrationNonUniqueException - is the user is pre existing
